Blade Dance.card_desc: [Whirl] Increase the distance of Whirl by {scale=10|10}%

Fan the Flames.card_desc: [Billow] Kills reduce the cooldown of Billow by {scale=20|20}%

Footwork.card_desc: [Counter] Activating Counter increases your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 3s.

Guillotine.card_desc: [Spite] Spite now deals 25% of the targets maximum Health with every hit, grants Zhin damage immunity, and charges 15% faster.

Hideout.card_desc: [Billow] Billow reduces the cooldown of Whirl by {scale=1|1}s.

Master Stance.card_desc: [Counter] Successful hits with Counter reduce the cooldown of Whirl by {scale=1|1}s.

Perfect Block.card_desc: [Counter] Successfully Countering an attack will Heal you for {scale=100|100} health.

Smolder.card_desc: [Billow] Heal for 33% of your maximum Health per second during Billow.

Up in Smoke.card_desc: [Billow] Increase the Speed of Billow by {scale=10|10}%

Viciousness.card_desc: [Counter] Successfully Countering an attack will generate {scale=2|2} ammo.

Wild Fire.card_desc: [Whirl] Reduce the cooldown of Whirl by {scale=0.5|0.5}s for every enemy hit.

Yomi.card_desc: [Weapon] Your heavy hit with Inferno Blade pierces enemies, has an extended range limit, and deals 150 additional damage.

Asche.card_desc: [Rauchschwaden] Die Aktivierung von Rauchschwaden erzeugt {scale=1|1} Munition.

Beinarbeit.card_desc: [Konter] Die Aktivierung von Konter erhöht dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Brennstoff.card_desc: [Wirbel] Die Aktivierung von Wirbel gewährt 2s lang {scale=5|5}% Lebensraub.

Feuer entfachen.card_desc: [Rauchschwaden] Kills reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Rauchschwaden um {scale=20|20}%.

Guillotine.card_desc: [Bosheit] Bosheit fügt dem Ziel mit jedem Treffer 25% von dessen maximaler Gesundheit als Schaden zu, gewährt Zhin Immunität gegen Schaden und lädt 15% schneller auf.

Herzlos.card_desc: [Rüstung] Kills erhöhen dein Lauftempo 4s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Infamie.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Klingentanz.card_desc: [Wirbel] Erhöht die Weite von Wirbel um {scale=10|10}%.

Meisterhaltung.card_desc: [Konter] Erfolgreiche Konter reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Wirbel um {scale=1|1}s.

Perfekter Block.card_desc: [Konter] Bei einem erfolgreichen Konter wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Schwelendes Feuer.card_desc: [Rauchschwaden] Während der Dauer von Rauchschwaden wirst du um 33% deiner maximalen LP geheilt.

Span.card_desc: [Wirbel] Die Aktivierung von Wirbel erzeugt {scale=1|1} Munition.

Verpufft.card_desc: [Rauchschwaden] Erhöht das Tempo von Rauchschwaden um {scale=10|10}%.

Versteck.card_desc: [Rauchschwaden] Die Aktivierung von Rauchschwaden reduziert die Abklingzeit von Wirbel um {scale=1|1}s.

Wildfeuer.card_desc: [Wirbel] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Wirbel pro getroffenem Gegner um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Yomi.card_desc: [Waffe] Deine starken Schwertschwünge durchdringen Gegner, verursachen 150 Schaden zusätzlich und haben eine größere Reichweite.

Attise-flammes.card_desc: [Volute de fumée] Chaque exécution réduit le temps de recharge de Volute de fumée de {scale=20|20}%.

Cachette.card_desc: [Volute de fumée] Volute de fumée se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

Charbons ardents.card_desc: [Volute de fumée] Activer Volute de fumée rend {scale=1|1} munition(s).

Contre parfait.card_desc: [Contre] Contrer une attaque vous redonne {scale=100|100} PV.

D\u00e9luge de lames.card_desc: [Tourbillon] La distance de Tourbillon augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

En cendres.card_desc: [Volute de fumée] Pendant Volute de fumée, vous regagnez 33% de vos PV max. par seconde.

\u00c9vanescent.card_desc: [Volute de fumée] Pendant Volute de fumée, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Feu mal\u00e9fique.card_desc: [Tourbillon] Tourbillon se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite par ennemi touché.

Guillotine.card_desc: [Malveillance] Pendant Malveillance, vous êtes immunisé aux dégâts et chaque coup retire 25% des PV max. La vitesse de chargement augmente de 15%.

Impitoyable.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque exécution augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 4s.

Incendiaire.card_desc: [Tourbillon] Pendant 2s après Tourbillon, vous avez {scale=5|5}% de drain de vie.

Jeu de jambes.card_desc: [Contre] Activer Contre augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s.

Malfaisance.card_desc: [Armure] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de 5%.

Posture de ma\u00eetre.card_desc: [Contre] Toucher un ennemi avec Contre réduit le temps de recharge de Tourbillon de {scale=1|1}s.

Yomi.card_desc: [Arme] Votre troisième tir traverse les ennemis et inflige 150 dégâts supplémentaires. Sa portée est illimitée.

\u4f59\u70ec.card_desc: [消散] 激活消散时回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u5251\u672f\u5927\u5e08.card_desc: [反击] 反击的持续时间提高{scale=0.25|0.25}秒

\u58f0\u540d\u72fc\u85c9.card_desc: [护甲] 最大生命值提高{scale=50|50}点

\u5b8c\u7f8e\u683c\u6321.card_desc: [反击] 成功反击后回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u5e7d\u51a5.card_desc: [武器] 普通攻击第三下重攻击会穿过敌人，造成150点额外伤害，且没有距离限制

\u65a9\u9996\u4e4b\u5251.card_desc: [业火连斩] 业火连斩的充能速度提升{scale=12.75|.75}%，且每次攻击造成目标最大生命值25%的伤害。攻击期间烬可以免疫伤害

\u65e0\u5fc3.card_desc: [护甲] 获得击杀时移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续4秒

\u706b\u4e0a\u6d47\u6cb9.card_desc: [烈焰旋风] 使用烈焰旋风之后获得{scale=5|5}%生命偷取，持续2秒

\u70c8\u7130\u65cb\u98ce.card_desc: [烈焰旋风] 烈焰旋风的行进距离提高{scale=10|10}%

\u717d\u98ce\u70b9\u706b.card_desc: [消散] 获得击杀时消散的冷却时间降低{scale=20|20}%

\u72c2\u91ce\u4e4b\u706b.card_desc: [烈焰旋风] 每命中一个敌人，烈焰旋风的冷却时间就会降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u7f25\u7f08\u4e4b\u70df.card_desc: [消散] 消散期间的移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%

\u8ff7\u8e2a\u6b65.card_desc: [反击] 使用反击后3秒内，移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%

\u90aa\u5ff5.card_desc: [反击] 成功反击后回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u95f7\u71c3.card_desc: [消散] 消散期间每秒回复20%最大生命值

\u9690\u533f\u4e4b\u706b.card_desc: [消散] 消散的持续时间提高{scale=0.4|0.4}秒

\u9ed1\u6697\u706b\u79cd.card_desc: [烈焰旋风] 使用烈焰旋风后获得{scale=1|1}发弹药

Agilidad.card_desc: [Contraataque] Activar Contraataque aumenta tu velocidad de movimiento un {scale=10|10}% durante 3s.

Ardor.card_desc: [Avance neblinoso] Te curas un 33% de tu salud máxima mientras dure Avance neblinoso.

Aroma de drag\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta tu cantidad de munición en {scale=1|1}.

Bloqueo perfecto.card_desc: [Contraataque] Contraatacar con éxito te cura {scale=100|100} PS.

Brasas.card_desc: [Avance neblinoso] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición al activar Avance neblinoso.

Combustible.card_desc: [Vórtice] Vórtice obtiene un {scale=5|5}% de robo de vida durante 2s.

Cruel.card_desc: [Armadura] Las bajas otorgan un {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 4s.

Echar le\u00f1a al fuego.card_desc: [Avance neblinoso] Matar a enemigos reduce la recarga de Avance neblinoso {scale=20|20}%.

En llamas.card_desc: [Avance neblinoso] Aumenta la velocidad de Avance neblinoso un {scale=10|10}%.

Escondite.card_desc: [Avance neblinoso] Avance neblinoso reduce la recarga de Vórtice en {scale=1|1}s.

Feroz.card_desc: [Contraataque] Recuperas {scale=2|2} de munición al contraatacar con éxito.

Guillotina.card_desc: [Rencor] Rencor inflige un 25% de daño de la salud máxima del objetivo con cada golpe, le otorga a Zhin inmunidad al daño y recarga un 15% más rápido.

Incendio forestal.card_desc: [Vórtice] Su recarga se reduce en {scale=0.5|0.5} s por cada enemigo alcanzado.

Infamia.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumentas tu salud máxima en {scale=50|50} PS.

Le\u00f1a.card_desc: [Vórtice] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición al activar Vórtice.

Postura de maestr\u00eda.card_desc: [Contraataque] Acertar un golpe exitosamente con Contraataque reduce la recarga de Vórtice en {scale=1|1}s.

Yomi.card_desc: [Arma] Tu ataque pesado con Espada infernal perfora a los enemigos, tiene un límite de alcance extendido e inflige 150 PS de daño adicionales.

Acendedor.card_desc: [Giro] Ativar o Giro te dá {scale=1|1} de munição.

Agressividade.card_desc: [Revide] Contra-atacar com sucesso uma agressão te dá {scale=2|2} de munição.

Bloqueio Perfeito.card_desc: [Revide] Contra-atacar com sucesso uma agressão faz você se curar em {scale=100|100} de vida.

Brasas.card_desc: [Névoa] Ativar Névoa te dá {scale=1|1} de munição.

Dan\u00e7a da L\u00e2mina.card_desc: [Giro] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a distância percorrida pelo Giro.

Defumado.card_desc: [Névoa] Cura em 33% da sua vida máxima por segundo enquanto durar a Névoa.

Esconderijo.card_desc: [Névoa] A Névoa reduz o intervalo do Giro em {scale=1|1}s.

F\u00e3 do Fogo.card_desc: [Névoa] Eliminações reduzem o intervalo de Névoa em {scale=20|20}%.

Fogo Selvagem.card_desc: [Giro] Reduz o intervalo do Giro em {scale=0.5|0.5}s a cada inimigo atingido.

Gasolina no Fogo.card_desc: [Giro] Giro concede {scale=5|5}% de roubo de vida por 2s.

Guilhotina.card_desc: [Agressão] Agressão agora causa dano de 25% da vida máxima do alvo a cada acerto e dá a Zhin imunidade a dano. E também recarrega a suprema 15% mais rápido.

Inf\u00e2mia.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima base em {scale=50|50}.

P\u00e9s Ligeiros.card_desc: [Revide] Ativar o Revide aumenta em {scale=10|10}% sua velocidade de movimento por 3s.

Pose de Mestre.card_desc: [Revide] Ataques bem-sucedidos com Revide reduzem o intervalo do Giro em {scale=1|1}s.

Sem Cora\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Armadura] Eliminações dão {scale=10|10}% mais velocidade de movimento por 4s.

Virou Fuma\u00e7a.card_desc: [Névoa] Aumenta a velocidade de Névoa em {scale=10|10}%.

Yomi.card_desc: [Arma] O golpe mais poderoso da sua Lâmina Infernal atravessa os inimigos, tem alcance aumentado e causa 150 mais dano.

\u0411\u0435\u0437\u0436\u0430\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Убийства увеличивают вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 4 с.

\u0411\u0435\u0441\u0447\u0435\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье увеличивается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0413\u0438\u043b\u044c\u043e\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Неприязнь] Каждое попадание Неприязнью наносит урон в размере 25% от максимального здоровья цели. Неприязнь заряжается на 15% быстрее и дает Дзину иммунитет.

\u0414\u0438\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u043e\u0.card_desc: [Вихрь] Каждое попадание по врагу сокращает перезарядку Вихря на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0401\u043c\u0438.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваша третья атака "Адским клинком" пронзает врагов, наносит на 150 ед. больше урона, а ее дальность увеличивается.

\u0417\u043e\u043b\u0430.card_desc: [Облако дыма] Активация Облака дыма генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0418\u0433\u0440\u0430 \u0441 \u043e\u.card_desc: [Облако дыма] Убийства сокращают перезарядку Облака дыма на {scale=20|20}%.

\u0418\u0434\u0435\u0430\u043b\u044c\u04.card_desc: [Контратака] Успешная контратака исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041a\u043b\u0443\u0431\u044b \u0434\u0.card_desc: [Облако дыма] Скорость Облака дыма увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0420\u0430\u0431\u043e\u0442\u0430 \u0.card_desc: [Контратака] Активация Контратаки увеличивает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u0421\u0442\u043e\u0439\u043a\u0430 \u0.card_desc: [Контратака] Попадания Контратакой сокращают перезарядку Вихря на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0422\u043b\u0435\u044e\u0449\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Облако дыма] Вы исцеляетесь на 33% от вашего максимального здоровья в секунду во время действия Облака дыма.

\u0423\u0431\u0435\u0436\u0438\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Облако дыма] Убийства сокращают перезарядку Облака дыма на {scale=1|1} с.

Dym.card_desc: [Kłąb dymu] Przywraca 33% max zdrowia na sekundę w trakcie trwania Kłębu dymu.

Gilotyna.card_desc: [Złośliwość] Złośliwość zadaje obrażenia w wys. 25% maks. PZ celu przy trafieniu i daje Zhinowi odporność na obrażenia. Zwiększa szybkość ładowania o 15%.

Infamia.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Kryj\u00f3wka.card_desc: [Kłąb dymu] Kłąb dymu skraca czas odnowienia Wiru o {scale=1|1} s.

Manewry.card_desc: [Kontra] Aktywacja Kontry zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s.

Mistrzowska postawa.card_desc: [Kontra] Udane trafienia Kontrą skracają czas odnowienia Wiru o {scale=1|1}s.

Okrucie\u0144stwo.card_desc: [Kontra] Udane skontrowanie ataku wytwarza {scale=2|2} szt. amunicji.

Okrutnik.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zabójstwa zwiększają szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 4 s.

Oliwa do ognia.card_desc: [Wir] Wir zapewnia {scale=5|5}% kradzieży życia na 2 s.

Po\u017coga.card_desc: [Wir] Skraca czas odnowienia Wiru o {scale=0.5|0.5} s za każde trafienie wroga.

Rozniecenie.card_desc: [Kłąb dymu] Zabójstwa skracają czas odnowienia Kłębu dymu o {scale=20|20}%.

Yomi.card_desc: [Broń] Mocny cios Piekielnym ostrzem przeszywa wrogów, ma wydłużony zasięg i zadaje 150 dodatkowych obrażeń.

Zarzewie.card_desc: [Kłąb dymu] Aktywacja Kłębu dymu generuje {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Zwidy.card_desc: [Kłąb dymu] Zwiększa szybkość Kłębu dymu o {scale=10|10}%.

Ahlaks\u0131zl\u0131k.card_desc: [Karşılık Ver] Bir saldırıya başarıyla Karşılık Vermek {scale=2|2} cephane oluşturur.

Ate\u015f Yak\u0131t\u0131.card_desc: [Burgaç] Burgaç 2 sn boyunca %{scale=5|5} Can Çalma verir.

Ayak Hakimiyeti.card_desc: [Karşılık Ver] Karşılık Ver'i etkinleştirmek Hareket Hızını 3 saniye boyunca %{scale=10|10} artırır.

Dumans\u0131z Ate\u015f.card_desc: [Dalga] Dalga esnasında her saniye maksimum Canının %33'ü kadar iyileş.

Giyotin.card_desc: [Kin] Kin artık her vuruşunda hedefin maksimum Canının %25'ini alıyor, Zhin'e hasar dokunulmazlığı veriyor ve %15 daha hızlı doluyor.

Kalpsiz.card_desc: [Zırh] Katletmeler 4 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı verir.

M\u00fckemmel Engelleme.card_desc: [Karşılık Ver] Bir saldırıya başarıyla Karşılık Vermek seni {scale=100|100} Can iyileştirir.

Usta Duru\u015fu.card_desc: [Karşılık Ver] Karşılık Ver ile yapılan başarılı vuruşlar Burgaç'ın bekleme süresini {scale=1|1} sn azaltır.

Vah\u015fi Ate\u015f.card_desc: [Burgaç] Vurduğun her düşman için Burgaç'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azalt.

Yomi.card_desc: [Silah] Cehennem Kılıcı ile yaptığın ağır vuruş düşmanı parçalar, menzili uzar ve 150 ek hasar verir.
